author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: نبيا و أصفيا طالب لقای اين يوم بديع بوده‌اند و همچنين أحزاب مختلفه أرض و چون آفتاب ظهور از سمآء مشيّت إلهی إشراق نمود کلّ منصعق و مدهوش مشاهده گشتند إلّا من شاء
translation: Great indeed is this Day! The allusions made to it in all the sacred Scriptures as the Day of God attest its greatness. The soul of every Prophet of God, of every Divine Messenger, hath thirsted for this wondrous Day. All the divers kindreds of the earth have, likewise, yearned to attain it. No sooner, however, had the Daystar of His Revelation manifested itself in the heaven of God’s Will, than all, except those whom the Almighty was pleased to guide, were found dumbfounded and heedless.
